full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 178 of 236 LC3KMAX6 Parkinson - Direct (Jury present) THE COURT: Thank you, members of the jury. Ms. Comey, you may continue with your direct examination of Mr. Parkinson. Mr. Parkinson, I remind you, you are under oath. Go ahead, Ms. Comey. MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. BY MS. COMEY: Q. Mr. Parkinson, good afternoon. A. Good afternoon. MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, would you please pull up for the witness, the parties, and the Court what's been marked for identification as Government 278. Q. Mr. Parkinson, I think we were talking about this right before the break. Do you recognize this? A. Yes. Q. What is it? A. It's the shower room. Q. And is this a fair and accurate depiction of a portion of the interior of 358 El Brillo Way as it appeared on October 20, 2005? A. True. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers this in evidence. MR. VERDELL: No objection, your Honor. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018279
